DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of Chinese herbal medicines for severe pandemic H1N1 influenza.
DOC.brief_title: A Pragmatic Randomized Controlled Trial of Chinese Herbal Medicine for Severe Pandemic H1N1 Influenza
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of severe pandemic H1N1 influenza patients and pandemic H1N1 influenza patients with risk factors for severe H1N1 influenza Rapid Diagnostic Tests:positive Age≥6 years Influenza symptoms occurred less than 48 hours and body temperature≥37.5℃ for pandemic H1N1 influenza patients with risk factors for severe H1N1 influenza Suffering from mental illness Attending other clinical studies on influenza Critical pandemic H1N1 influenza patients
